fn.p: ‘GENIE: GeoEngineering and NegatIve Emissions pathways in Europe’

We use the initialism ‘LGBTQIA +’ to refer to Lesbian (L), Gay (G), Bisexual (B), Transgender (T), Queer (Q), Intersexual (I), Asexual (A) people and all others (+) whose sexuality or gender identity is non-normative.
This Power Point presentation (in its original, Portuguese version) has been provided as supplemental data.

Ongoing projects mentioned in the Power Point presentation include: David Keith’s SCoPEx, the Ocean Iron Fertilization Program of the GEOMAR Helmholtz Centre for Ocean Research and Climeworks’ CDR project.
